content: "Attention all crypto enthusiasts!We are excited to announce the launch of our new token, SHIBAS! Today marks the beginning of an exciting new project in the world of cryptocurrencies.Website: https://www.shibastoken.comPresale link: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x94b661CF163B496B860125Ab749Fb86EaeeA47f4?chain=BSCPresale Ending Soon! SOFTCAP only 2 BNB and no limits for HARDCAPDepending on presale results listing could be on a CEX exchange or DEX on PANCAKESWAPTelegram: https://t.me/shibastokenofficialTwitter: https://twitter.com/shibas_tokenWhitepaper: https://shibastoken.com/whitepaperExplorer: https://bscscan.com/token/0x6b0b2138ab2ae10a718d0e504284ef61f872f09cContract Address:  0x6b0B2138AB2Ae10a718d0e504284Ef61F872f09cTokenomics: - Marketing Fee: 2%- Liquidity Fee: 2%- Reflection Fee on Buy: 2%- Reflection Fee on Sell: 2%- Total Fees When Buying Token: 6%- Total Fees When Selling Token: 6%- Total supply: 1000000000000000 SHIBASListing will be made on DEX or CEX depending on presale results!The team behind SHIBAS token is starting development from scratch, currently working on creating a unique logo and website, and building a strong community around the token through social media and other online platforms.Join us on this exciting journey and be a part of the #SHIBAScommunity. Follow us on our socials for updates and information on how to purchase SHIBAS tokens.Thank you for your support!SHIBAS Team"
